statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 1 AND behavior_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND behavior_description LIKE '%spam%';
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM recommendation_settings WHERE algorithm = 'CF' AND frequency = 'daily';
DELETE FROM UserBehaviorLogs WHERE user_id = 10 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM RecommendationsHistory WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-15' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30);
